lead_paragraph: Angry exchanges among members of the co-op board of 301 East 62nd Street have dissolved into name-calling and taunts about board members’ height, spouses, intellect and virility.
snippet: Angry exchanges among members of the co-op board of 301 East 62nd Street have dissolved into name-calling and taunts about board members’ height, spouses, intellect and virility.

headline.main: Behind Unassuming Walls, a War of Words Among Co-op Board Members
headline.seo: Members of New York Co-op Board Wage Battle
